title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Blue Blood Final 4, Coach K's Final Run, Gonzaga Flaws, Coach Cal Disappointment with Aaron Torres
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Blue Blood Final 4, Coach K's Final Run, Gonzaga Flaws, Coach Cal Disappointment with Aaron Torres
description:
First (3:00), Colin explains why an expanded college football playoff would never produce a St. Peters-like Cinderella story, what's behind the across-the-board sports ratings increases, why fans and media are overreacting to the Chiefs moving on from Tyreek Hill, and his biggest pet peave with American soccer fans.

Then, College Hoop Insider - and host of The Aaron Torres Sports Podcast - Aaron Torres joins Colin to discuss why this year's tournament has been such a huge success (19:00), why Duke is so dangerous right now (22:00), why Kansas' run was unexpected despite their 1-seed (24:00), how Villanova is still underrated (27:00), why there was so much pushback on the Hubert Davis to UNC hire (32:00), why Gonzaga can't win it all (37:00), how many more disappointing seasons Coach Cal can survive at Kentucky (40:00), why Kentucky is like the Dallas Cowboys (47:00), why it's so hard to fix bad college officiating (51:00). Finally, Aaron gives his Final 4 picks (53:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
